Text:
Please seed to at least a 1:1 ratio when your done downloading so that we can spread the torrent more efficiently.

Also, I would appreciate any feedback on the quality of the release as well as on how easy it was to torrent.

If Game Informer starts do do more of these video game movie commentaries I will be releasing those as well so feedback on the quality of this file will be important for quality control in future release.

Until then, seed up me hearties, yo ho!
